description:
This table contains information related to the financial assistance tracker record's update history.


Whenever any of the following details of a program tracker are changed or added, a row is added to this table.


1. Status


2. Decision date


3. Approval start date


4. Approval end date


5. Note


6. Source


7. Method


8. Medications

columns.name: FIN_ASST_TRACKER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the financial assistance program tracker record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: UPDATE_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The instant when the update was made.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user who made the update.

columns.name: UPDATE_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category ID of the program tracker status after the update was made.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Pending


Approved


Denied


Waiting for supervisor's approval


Pending Appeal


Overturned


Inactive


Entered in Error


Signed


Needs Review

columns.name: UPDATE_DECISION_DATE
columns.description: The decision date after the update was made.

columns.name: UPDATE_START_DATE
columns.description: The approval start date after the update was made.

columns.name: UPDATE_END_DATE
columns.description: The approval end date after the update was made.

columns.name: UPDATE_NOTE
columns.description: The note added when the update was made.

columns.name: UPDATE_PROGRAM_SOURCE_C_NAME
columns.description:
History of the source specified for this program tracker after an update was made to the tracker.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: UPDATE_PROGRAM_METHOD_C_NAME
columns.description:
History of the method specified for this program tracker after an update was made to the tracker.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Free Drug


Stock Replacement


Grant


Co-Pay Card

columns.name: UPDATE_NOTE_ID
columns.description: ID of the note record that contains the comment entered as part of the update.
